lines: Tie me kra tie, abɔfo nnwom rewosow
Asase so mfuw so ne mpoano nso!
Nsεm a wɔde ‘sanku rebε no yε dεw,
Nkwa fof'ro a bɔne remfram' ho nsεm!
Yεkɔ anim, yεte sε wɔreto sε:
Nnwom no dεw gyigye wɔ sum mu baabiara,
Asεmpan' ho dwom no de yεn kɔ fie.
Yesu nne gyigye ‘sase ne po so,
Na akra abrεfo mpempem dan wɔn ho,
Abɔfo! Monto dwom, na monkɔ so nwεn,
Monto soro nnwom no bi nkyerε yεn;
Na ɔkra sum bεdan adekyee dɔ.
